creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: fish motif porcelain bowl decorated overall with a speckled cream glaze, over which is a brushed design in a tenmoku glaze; center of the bowl with a fish within a circular border; exterior with two broad circular bands with brushed and incised fish
markings: impressed makers marks near foot: BL and St Ives seals; ENGLAND seal on side of footring
medium: Porcelain, brushed design in tenmoku glaze
title: Bowl
